programme.title: The CIA and Kuwaiti conspiracy
programme.short_synopsis: Are the murmurings of a CIA and Kuwaiti conspiracy over a war in the Gulf to be believed?
programme.medium_synopsis: A press conference by the Iraqi Ambassador in Washington and American scepticism surrounding the allegations of a CIA and Kuwaiti conspiracy, as detailed by Alistair Cooke.
